thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 07 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Veeco Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.34

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Veeco Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.34
text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Veeco Instruments Inc:
* VEECO REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.34 * Q1 REVENUE $158.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $151.2 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.06 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 REVENUE IS EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $145 MILLION TO $170 MILLION
* Q2 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE ARE EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $0.45 TO $0.26
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ARE EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $0.01 TO $0.20
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13, REVENUE VIEW $157.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
